features: 【Ultra-Soft Faux Sheepskin Rug】: Our faux fur rug is made of high quality and eco-friendly mongolian faux fur, hypoallergenic, soft, skin-friendly and odorless, which means much more friendly for kids and pets. fluffy material, super luxurious rug gives superior comfort and touch to your skin.

【Anti-Slip Bottom Design】: The bottom of the white fur rugs for bedroom is soft suede leather lining, it effectively provides anti-skid properties. The neat seams strengthen the strong seam connection and ensure the durability and life span of the fur rug.

【Upgrade Version & More Thick】: Compared with the previous version, we have made a thickening design for this fur area rugs. In the past, the fuzzy rug was 0.8kg for 1 square meter, and the updated thickness has reached 1.1kg - You'll have to feel it to believe it!

【Wonderful Decoration For Your Home】: Fluffy white rug could widely use in home decoration of bedroom, kid's room, a lovely snugly pet mat, a luxurious show pad for shop window, the back or besides of a chair, bed, sofa, living room, bathroom, which will adding a sense of warmth and luxury to your home.

【You Will Get】: 1 * fur area rugs. We use high-quality and high-density artificial fur to give your skin the ultimate touch. After receiving the carpet, open the package and shake it to relax the fur. Give them some time and they will become fluffy and full of vitality. Refunds or replacements are always stress-free. You can buy with confidence. If you have any questions about the area rugs, please feel free to contact us. We will provide you with a satisfactory solution within 24 hours.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Coumore Ultra Soft Faux Sheepskin Fur Rug Fluffy Area Rugs Chair Couch Cover Fuzzy Rugs for Bedroom Bedside Floor Sofa Living Room Coumore Faux Fur Sheepskin Rug Coumore upgrade faux sheepskin collection is sleek and soft to the touch. These fuzzy rugs come in solid colors that give it a beautiful look. It is so lush and soft that you would think it was real sheepskin, bringing you softness feeling like stepping out onto a cloud and shields toes from the cold floor. The backing of this rug is also soft which makes it easily portable. It can also be used as a bed cover to give your bed a new stylish look. Spread happiness throughout your home with these luxurious faux sheepskin fur area rugs. Super Soft Touch, Safety, Ideal for Children & PetsAnti-Slip BottomThe rug's thick, plush tufts across its entire top surface offer a beautiful appearance, velvety feel.Perfect for any Room: Living Room, Bedroom, Dining Room, Nursery, Foyer, or Home Office

A: Our fuzzy rug is made of faux fur, soft, skin-friendly and odorless. 2)Q: Is this pure white or ivory white? A: our rug is pure white. You can refer to the picture, we try to make the product picture consistent with the product itself. 3)Q: Is it machine washable? A: of course, in order to better protect the texture of the rug, it is recommended to use a laundry bag to cover the rug when you wash it with machine. 4)Q: Is this rug packed in vacuum? Would it be difficult for me to recover its original shape? A: Our packaging did not take 100% vacuum, only a small part of the extraction, so you don't have to worry about the difficulty of restoring the original shape. 5)Q:What is the fluffy rug of the carpet? A: The advantage of our rugs is that they are thicker and more comfortable, and can be clearly felt in the hand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and white
reviews.reviewText: Looks exactly like picture. Looks great in my accent corner of living room. Would order again!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice throw rug for bed or sofa
reviews.reviewText: I love it, my Chihuahuas and mini-Chugs love it more. Excellent price for the item. Very attractive, very soft. Totally easy to brush gently or spot clean as needed. Arrived quickly, no chemical smell right out of the packing. Very pleased with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2022
reviews.reviewText: honestly so soft and comfy and bigger than i expected. it’s white so it’s obviously going to get somewhat dirty overtime but that’s ok because i can just buy a new one since it’s so inexpensive!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The rug is pure white, soft, plush and appears to be good quality. The size and thickness are perfect for what I was looking for. I haven’t noticed any shedding so far. I didn’t rate the stain resistance because I have not tested it. I also can’t verify the “suede leather bottom” as listed in the item description. It is suede, but I don’t believe it’s leather. The item tag does not list any material information. Overall, I really like it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 28, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on March 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and fluffy
reviews.reviewText: Got it for a runner rug in my bathroom sink area that’s in my bedroom to match the one I got for my bedroom definitely didn’t disappoint me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Me gusto mucho aunque un poco arrugada

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Length was good but not very thick
reviews.reviewText: Length and color worked out good and it was soft to touch but I have another smaller one that I got elsewhere it's padding is much thicker so eventually I will replace this one with one with a thicker padding. For the price though this one works for now.
The media could not be loaded. So very nice
